players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this investigation."
Diana: "I'm shocked about Alice. She seemed so innocent. We need to think carefully about who could have done this - it has to be one of us three remaining."
Diana: "Bob, your silence is concerning. Charlie and I are at least trying to discuss what happened, but you haven't said a word. Why aren't you contributing to finding Alice's killer?"
